statements: DELETE FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE recycling_facility = 'Main Facility';
DELETE FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE recycling_facility = 'Eco Green Recycling';
DELETE FROM electronic_items WHERE weight > 5 AND material_recovered = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM recycling_facilities WHERE facility_name = 'Recycle Now' AND location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM RecyclingProcesses WHERE facility_id = 101 AND weight_recycled > 1000;
DELETE FROM RecycledMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND recycling_method = 'Mechanical';
